FROM memberTel a WHERE 1=1 AND DelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND seq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND tel LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND member_seq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.seq ,a.member_seq ,a.div_tel ,a.tel_defaultNy ,a.tel ,a.tel_company_code ,a.DelNy
ORDER BY a.seq DESC
SELECT a.seq ,a.member_seq ,a.div_tel ,a.tel_defaultNy ,a.tel ,a.tel_company_code ,a.DelNy FROM memberTel a WHERE 1=1 AND a.seq = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE memberTel SET DelNy = 1 WHERE seq = #{seq}
